description: A small totem, made of twisted fiber. Magical runes have been painted onto its surface. Faint red lines occaisonally pass along its surface.
A small totem, made of twisted fiber. Magical runes have been painted onto its surface. Faint green lines occaisonally pass along its surface.
A small totem, made of twisted fiber. Magical runes have been painted onto its surface, which now radiate with a blue aura.
A small totem of whittled wood. Magical runes have been carved into its surface, which now radiate with a yellow aura.
A small totem of whittled wood. Magical runes have been carved into its surface, which now have an inky pitch.
A small totem of whittled wood. Magical runes have been carved into its surface, which now radiate with a gray aura.
A small totem of whittled wood. Magical runes have been carved into its surface, which now radiate with an aquamarine aura.
A small totem of whittled wood. Magical runes have been carved into its surface, which now radiate with a dark green aura.
A small totem, forged of metal. Magical runes have been inlaid onto its surface. It feels warm to the touch.
A small totem, forged of metal. Magical runes have been inlaid onto its surface, which are now charged.
A small totem, forged of metal. Magical runes have been inlaid onto its surface. It feels cold to the touch.
A small totem, forged of metal. Magical runes have been inlaid onto its surface. It feels heavier than it should.
